data.actual_result: It shows results for the same channel
data.expected_result: It should show results for the other channel
data.short_description: If a server has many channels with the same name, searching with `in:#channel` will always bring up results for the same channel, no matter which suggestion you select in autocomplete
data.steps_to_repro: - Be in a server with several channels with the same name. For example, DTesters has two channels named "rules" - Go to Search - Select the `in:` filter - Type "rules". Both channels will show up in autocomplete. Select any and submit the query - Now go back, and make a new search. Type the same thing as before, but this time select the other rules channel in the suggestions (the one you haven't selected the first time) - Submit and observe results
